display_name: Average frequency of drinking 100% pure fruit juices such as orange, mango, apple, grape, and pineapple juices in the last 4 weeks (do not count punch, Kool-Aid, Tampico, sports drinks, or Goya juice) - Mother
description: In the past 4 weeks, on average, how often did you drink 100% pure fruit juices such as orange, mango, apple, grape and pineapple juices? Do not count punch, Kool-Aid, Tampico, sports drinks, or Goya juice.

other.source_name: In the past 4 weeks, on average, how often did you drink 100% pure fruit juices such as orange, mango, apple, grape and pineapple juices? Do not count punch, Kool-Aid, Tampico, sports drinks, or Goya juice.
